mapper.select: select ps.process_state_id, ps.content_id, ps.user_id, ps.process_item_id, ps.msg, ps.remark, DATE_FORMAT(ps.add_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as add_date, ppi.label from publish_process_state ps inner join publish_process_item ppi on ppi.process_item_id = ps.process_item_id where ps.content_id = #{contentId} order by ps.add_date desc

select p.process_id, p.content_type_id, p.process_item_id, ppi.label from publish_process p inner join publish_process_item ppi on ppi.process_item_id = p.process_item_id where p.content_type_id = #{contentTypeId} order by p.process_sort
mapper.update: update publish_content set content = #{template}, update_date = now() where content_id = #{id}
update publish_content set snapshot = #{snapshot}, update_date = now() where content_id = #{id}
update publish_content set process_item_id = 6 where process_item_id = 5 and end_date < now()
mapper.select: select t.* from publish_terminal pt inner join terminal_basic_info t on t.id = pt.terminal_id where pt.content_id = #{contentId}
select eu.*, u.username from publish_examine_user eu inner join sys_user u on u.user_id = eu.user_id where eu.state in(0, 3) group by eu.content_id, eu.sort
